title: Handle a Keg Change
description: A bartender reports that the keg for a specific beer has run out.

tasks.description: Receive the report that the keg is empty.
Check inventory for a replacement keg.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms a full keg is available in the cooler.

tasks.description: Dispatch a beverage technician to tap the new keg.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a work order for the technician.
